original_text: The disciples then came to John. They said to him, ‘Teacher, remember the man, Jesus, that you spoke to us about. He was with you on the other side of the Jordan River. Now he is baptizing people and everyone is going to him.’
korean_text: 그들이 요한에게 가서 이르되 랍비여 선생님과 함께 요단 강 저편에 있던 이 곧 선생님이 증언하시던 이가 세례를 베풀매 사람이 다 그에게로 가더이다

sentences.original_text: The disciples then came to John.
that you spoke to us about.
He was with you on the other side of the Jordan River.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 요단 강 건너편에 당신과 함께 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and everyone is going to him.'
